ai-tha-ap448:1.2_0: a sage undefiled in the world;
ai-tha-ap448:1.4_0: like a breeze from the dislike.
ai-tha-ap448:2.2_0: I bearing the drum of mango grove,
ai-tha-ap448:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap448:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap448:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap448:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Ambapālī.
ai-tha-ap448:8.1_0: In the sixth (whole) after the Elder Mimbarkiyans
